General.Name: Universal Textile Co Ltd
General.Description: Universal Textile Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells fabrics in Taiwan. The company offers polyester filament woven and T/R interweaving fabrics for men and ladies; polyester textured yarns; complex textured yarns; special cross-section polyester filament yarns; and recycled PET products. Universal Textile Co., Ltd. was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
